All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractCustomer
Represents an abstract customer in the simulation system.
ACustomerDao
The ACustomerDao class provides data access operations for the AbstractCustomer entity.
ArrivalProcess
The ArrivalProcess class manages the generation of customer arrivals at a pizzeria based on a normal distribution.
Bernoulli
A random number generator based on the Bernoulli distribution.
Beta
A random number generator based on the beta distribution.
BetaPrime
A random number generator based on the beta prime distribution.
Binomial
A random number generator based on the Binomial distribution.
Cauchy
A random number generator based on the Cauchy distribution.
ChiSquare
A random number generator based on the Chi-Square distribution.
Clock
The Clock class represents a singleton system clock to keep track of the simulation time.
ContinuousGenerator
A continuous generator provides a double value according to the distribution it relies on.
Controller
The Controller class handles the main interaction between the simulation view and model.
Customer
Represents a customer in the simulation system.
CustomerServicePoint
The CustomerServicePoint class represents a service point where customer groups are served in a queue.
DefaultSpecs
The DefaultSpecs class provides default specification values for various products and probabilities in the simulation, such as revenue, expenses, and probabilities for different types of items.
DefaultSpecs.Spec
 
DiscreteGenerator
A continuous generator provides a long value according to the distribution it relies on.
Distributions
offers several discrete and continuous distributions all seeded by a common well-spaced pseudo random number generator (PRNG).
DrinkNames
 
Engine
The Engine class is an abstract base class that represents the core simulation engine.
Erlang
A random number generator based on the Erlang distribution.
Event
The Event class represents an event in the simulation, containing the event type, the time at which the event occurs, and a unique identifier for the event.
EventList
The EventList class manages a list of events in a simulation, using a priority queue to ensure events are processed in order of occurrence.
EventType
 
FDistribution
A random number generator based on the F-distribution.
Finance
The Finance class handles the financial aspects of the restaurant simulation, including revenues, expenses, and net profit.
Gamma
A random number generator based on the normal distribution.
Generator
A generic Generator class which delegates its Seedable ability to a Distributions object.
Geometric
A random number generator based on the geometric distribution.
IControllerForModel
 
IControllerForView
 
IDao<Object>
 
IEngine
 
IEventType
 
Invgamma
A random number generator based on the invgamma distribution.
ISimuUI
 
IVisualization
 
Logistic
A random number generator based on the logistic distribution.
LogNormal
A random number generator based on the lognormal distribution.
Main
 
MariaDbJpaConnection
The MariaDbJpaConnection class is a singleton that manages the connection to a MariaDB database using JPA (Java Persistence API).
MetaGenerator
A class which allows for automatically parsing a distribution implementation and generate a class inheriting from Generator accordingly.
MyEngine
The MyEngine class is a specific implementation of the Engine class, managing the simulation of a pizzeria.
NegativeValueException
 
Negexp
A random number generator based on the negexp distribution.
Normal
A random number generator based on the normal distribution.
Order
The Order class represents a customer's order in the simulation.
OrderDao
The OrderDao class provides data access operations for the Order entity.
OrderRandomizer
The OrderRandomizer class generates random orders for customers in the simulation.
ParameterException
Error thrown when a distribution is passed incorrect parameters.
Pareto
A random number generator based on the pareto distribution.
Pascal
A random number generator based on the pascal distribution.
Pizza
The Pizza class represents a pizza in the simulation.
PizzaNames
 
PizzaServicePoint
The PizzaServicePoint class represents a service point where pizzas are processed, including being placed in the oven and taken out after preparation.
PizzaSizes
 
Poisson
A random number generator based on the poisson distribution.
RandomGenerator
A random number generator producing pseudorandom numbers based on the value of a specific seed.
Seedable
represents classes which has a seed
SeedGenerator
A SeedGenerator is a DiscreteGenerator which produces well-spaced seeds according to its spacing attribute.
ServicePoint
The ServicePoint class represents a service point in the simulation, where customers wait in a queue to be served.
SimulatorGUI
 
SimulatorGUITest
 
SpecsController
The SpecsController class manages the user input for setting and saving simulation specifications.
TakeAway
The TakeAway class represents a takeaway order in the simulation.
Trace
The Trace class is a simple logging utility that outputs messages based on a specified trace level.
Trace.Level
 
Tstudent
A random number generator based on the tstudent distribution.
Uniform
A random number generator based on the uniform distribution.
Visualization
 
Visualization3
 
Visualization4
 
Waiter
The Waiter class represents a waiter in the simulation, tracking their availability and assigning them to service points.
Weibull
A random number generator based on the weibull distribution.
